root.name: Rap Attack: 2pacalypse Now
root.description: Rap attack is free to play game distributed on download services which features fighting rappers with guns, mics and a hell of fans.PlotThe game begins with an intro introducing you to the Neo Dinosaurs creators of the rappers and also tells you about 2pac and the threat he is . You get to choose from 3 different rappers with slightly different stories. The rappers are 50 Cent, Chamillionare and Ice Cube.
